Suite : default

Feature: Contact form validation in english

In order to verify the contact from submission in a correct way It should accept only correct value For incorrect or blank field it should display notification On submission of the form it should show a notification message

  • @api
  • @javascript
  • @en
  • @es
  • @neg

Scenario Outline: Validate there should not be any success message when form filled with Blank and Space value.

  1. Given I am on "/en" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  2. When I follow "Contact" in the "footer" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionLinkFollow()
  3. Then I should see the heading "Website feedback" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()
  4. When I fill in "Your name" with "" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  5. And I fill in "Your email address" with "" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  6. And I fill in "Subject" with "" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  7. And I fill in "Message" with "" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  8. And I press the "Send message" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  9. Then I should not see "Your message has been sent." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageNotContainsText()
  10. Given I am on "/es" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  11. When I follow "Contacto" in the "footer" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionLinkFollow()
  12. Then I should see the heading "Comentarios sobre el sitio web" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()
  13. When I fill in "Su nombre" with " " Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  14. And I fill in "Su dirección de correo electrónico" with " " Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  15. And I fill in "Asunto" with " " Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  16. And I fill in "Mensaje" with " " Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  17. And I press the "Enviar mensaje" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  18. Then I should not see "Su mensaje ha sido enviado." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageNotContainsText()
  • @en
  • @es
  • @smoke

Scenario Outline: Validate success message for successful submission of the form.

  1. Given I am on "/en" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  2. When I follow "Contact" in the "footer" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionLinkFollow()
  3. Then I should see the heading "Website feedback" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()
  4. When I fill in "Your name" with "Parita Patel" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  5. And I fill in "Your email address" with "parita.patel+001@axelerant.com" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  6. And I fill in "Subject" with "Inquiry" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  7. And I fill in "Message" with "Test Message" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  8. And I press the "Send message" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  9. Then I should see "Your message has been sent." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText() 
    The text "Your message has been sent." was not found anywhere in the text of the current page.
  10. Given I am on "/es" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  11. When I follow "Contacto" in the "footer" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionLinkFollow()
  12. Then I should see the heading "Comentarios sobre el sitio web" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()
  13. When I fill in "Su nombre" with "Parita Patel" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  14. And I fill in "Su dirección de correo electrónico" with "parita.patel+001@axelerant.com" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  15. And I fill in "Asunto" with "Consulta" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  16. And I fill in "Mensaje" with "Mensaje de prueba" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  17. And I press the "Enviar mensaje" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  18. Then I should see "Su mensaje ha sido enviado." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText() 
    The text "Su mensaje ha sido enviado." was not found anywhere in the text of the current page.
  • @en
  • @es
  • @smoke

Scenario Outline: Validate success message for successful submission of the form.

  1. Given I am on "/en" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  2. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  3. When I follow "Contact" in the "footer" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionLinkFollow()
  4. Then I should see the heading "Website feedback" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()
  5. And I wait 2 second FeatureContext::wait()
  6. When I fill in "Your name" with "Parita Patel" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  7. And I fill in "Your email address" with "parita.patel+001@axelerant.com" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  8. And I fill in "Subject" with "Inquiry" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  9. And I fill in "Message" with: Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
    "Test Message"
"Test message 1"
"Test message 2"
  10. And I press the "Send message" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  11. Then I should see "Your message has been sent." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText() 
    The text "Your message has been sent." was not found anywhere in the text of the current page.
  12. Given I am on "/es" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  13. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  14. When I follow "Contacto" in the "footer" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionLinkFollow()
  15. Then I should see the heading "Comentarios sobre el sitio web" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()
  16. And I wait 2 second FeatureContext::wait()
  17. When I fill in "Su nombre" with "Parita Patel" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  18. And I fill in "Su dirección de correo electrónico" with "parita.patel+001@axelerant.com" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  19. And I fill in "Asunto" with "Consulta" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  20. And I fill in "Mensaje" with: Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
    "Mensaje de prueba"
"Test mesahge 1"
"Test mesahge 2"
  21. And I press the "Enviar mensaje" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  22. Then I should see "Su mensaje ha sido enviado." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText() 
    The text "Su mensaje ha sido enviado." was not found anywhere in the text of the current page.
  • @es
  • @pystring

Scenario: Verify contact form is submitted successfully in spansish when "Message" field value is filled with pyString

  1. Given I am on "/es" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  2. When I follow "Contacto" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::clickLink()
  3. Then I should see the heading "Comentarios sobre el sitio web" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()
  4. When I fill in "Su nombre" with "Parita Patel" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  5. And I fill in "Su dirección de correo electrónico" with "parita.patel+001@axelerant.com" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  6. And I fill in "Asunto" with "Consulta" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  7. And I fill in "Mensaje" with: Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
    Lorem Ipsum es simplemente un texto ficticio de la
industria de la impresión y la composición tipográfica.
Lorem Ipsum ha sido el texto ficticio
el texto ficticio estándar de la industria desde el año 1500,
cuando un impresor desconocido tomó una galera de
una galerada de tipos y la mezcló para hacer un libro de muestras de tipos.
No sólo ha sobrevivido cinco siglos,
Ha sobrevivido no sólo a cinco siglos,
sino también al salto a la composición tipográfica electrónica,
permaneciendo esencialmente sin cambios.
Se popularizó en la década de 1960 con la
con el lanzamiento de las hojas de Letraset que contenían pasajes de Lorem Ipsum,
y más recientemente con los programas de autoedición
como Aldus PageMaker, que incluye versiones de Lorem Ipsum.
  8. And I press the "Enviar mensaje" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  9. Then I should see "Su mensaje ha sido enviado." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText() 
    The text "Su mensaje ha sido enviado." was not found anywhere in the text of the current page.

  • @es

Scenario: Verify contact form is showing 5 times submission error message, when form is filled more than 5 times in an hour

  1. Given I am on "/" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  2. When I follow "Contact" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::clickLink()
  3. Then I should see the heading "Website feedback" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()
  4. When I fill in "Your name" with "Parita Patel" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  5. And I fill in "Your email address" with "parita.patel+001@axelerant.com" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  6. And I fill in "Subject" with "Inquiry" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  7. And I fill in "Message" with: Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
    Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the
printing and typesetting industry.
Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's
standard dummy text ever since the 1500s,
when an unknown printer took a galley of
type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.
It has survived not only five centuries,
It has survived not only five centuries,
but also the leap into electronic typesetting,
remaining essentially unchanged.
It was popularised in the 1960s with the
release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages,
and more recently with desktop publishing software
like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.
  8. And I press the "Send message" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  9. Then I should see "You cannot send more than 5 messages in 1 hour. Try again later." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
Feature has failed Scenarios passed : 40%, Scenarios failed : 60%

Feature: Content Moderation Steps and Role-wise permission in English and Spanish

1. Created a node in Draft with "Author" role checked below permissions: - Add node - Edit Node - Delete Node - Revision - Translate - Layout 2. Tried to access the draft node with Anonymous User 3. Edited Draft node with "Editor" role to publish it and role checked below permissions: - Add node - Edit Node - Delete Node - Revision - Translate - Layout 4. Trying to access the Publish node with Anonymous User 5. Edited Published node with "Editor" role and changed status to Archive 6. Trying to access the Archive node with Anonymous User 7. Validating that Editor can revert the revision 8. Accessed the Archived node with "Administrator" role to delete it and role checked below permissions: - Add node - Edit Node - Delete Node - Revision - Translate - Layout

  • @javascript
  • @api
  • @moderation
  • @roles
  • @permission
  • @en

Scenario: Content moderation state in English Create -> Draft -> Publish -> Archive -> Delete

  1. Given I am logged in as a user with the "author" role Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAuthenticatedByRole()
  2. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  3. And I am on "/en/node/add/recipe" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  4. And I should not see "Access denied" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageNotContainsText()
  5. Then I should see "Create Recipe" in the "header" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  6. When I fill in "Recipe Name" with "Behat_recipe_1" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  7. And I select "English" from "Language" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::selectOption()
  8. And I fill in "Preparation time" with "10" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  9. And I fill in "Cooking time" with "60" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  10. And I fill in "Number of servings" with "4" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  11. And I fill in "edit-field-recipe-category-target-id" with "Main courses" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  12. And I fill in "Tags" with "Vegetarian" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  13. And I wait for the AJAX to finish FeatureContext::iWaitForTheAjaxToFinish()
  14. And I press the "Add media" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  15. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  16. And I check the box "media_library_select_form[1]" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertCheckBox()
  17. And I click on the element with xpath "//button[text()='Insert selected']" FeatureContext::iClickOnTheElementWithXPath()
  18. And I wait for the AJAX to finish FeatureContext::iWaitForTheAjaxToFinish()
  19. And I fill in wysiwyg on field "Summary" with "Test Data" FeatureContext::iFillInWysiwygOnFieldWith()
  20. And I fill in "Ingredients" with "Cook1" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  21. And I fill in wysiwyg on field "Recipe instruction" with "Test Data" FeatureContext::iFillInWysiwygOnFieldWith()
  22. And I click the ".seven-details__summary" element FeatureContext::iClickTheElement()
  23. And I fill in "edit-path-0-alias" with "/recipes/behat_recipe_moderation" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  24. And I press the "Save" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  25. Then I should see "Recipe Behat_recipe_1 has been created." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  26. And I save the node url FeatureContext::iSaveTheNodeUrl()
  27. And I wait for AJAX to finish Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::iWaitForAjaxToFinish()
  28. And I should see "Behat_recipe_1" in the "breadcrumb" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  29. And I should see "Edit" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  30. And I click "Edit" in the "tabs" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionLinkFollow()
  31. Then I should not see the heading "Access denied" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertNotHeading()
  32. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  33. And I navigate to the node url FeatureContext::iAccessNodeUrl()
  34. And I should see "Delete" in the "tabs" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  35. And I click "Delete" in the "tabs" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionLinkFollow()
  36. Then I should not see the heading "Access denied" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertNotHeading()
  37. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  38. And I navigate to the node url FeatureContext::iAccessNodeUrl()
  39. And I should see "Revisions" in the "tabs" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  40. And I click "Revisions" in the "tabs" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionLinkFollow()
  41. Then I should not see the heading "Access denied" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertNotHeading()
  42. And I navigate to the node url FeatureContext::iAccessNodeUrl()
  43. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  44. And I should not see "Layout" in the "tabs" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertNotRegionText()
  45. And I should not see "Translate" in the "tabs" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertNotRegionText()
  46. And print current URL Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::printCurrentUrl()
  47. Then I log out Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAnonymousUser()
  48. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  49. Given I am an anonymous user Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAnonymousUser()
  50. And I navigate to the node url FeatureContext::iAccessNodeUrl()
  51. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  52. Then I should see the heading "Access denied" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()
  53. Given I am logged in as a user with the "editor" role Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAuthenticatedByRole()
  54. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  55. And I should not have access of "/en/node/add/recipe" FeatureContext::iShouldNotHaveAccessOf()
  56. When I navigate to the node url FeatureContext::iAccessNodeUrl()
  57. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  58. And I should see "Edit" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  59. And I click "Edit" in the "tabs" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionLinkFollow()
  60. Then I should not see the heading "Access denied" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertNotHeading()
  61. And I press the "Save" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  62. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  63. And I should see "Delete" in the "tabs" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  64. And I click "Delete" in the "tabs" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionLinkFollow()
  65. Then I should not see the heading "Access denied" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertNotHeading()
  66. And I navigate to the node url FeatureContext::iAccessNodeUrl()
  67. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  68. And I should see "Revisions" in the "tabs" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  69. And I click "Revisions" in the "tabs" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionLinkFollow()
  70. Then I should not see the heading "Access denied" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertNotHeading()

  149. And I click "Delete" in the "tabs" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionLinkFollow()

  151. And I should see "Are you sure you want to delete the content item Behat_recipe_1?" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  152. And I press the "Delete" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  153. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  154. And I should see "The Recipe Behat_recipe_1 has been deleted." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()

  • @roles
  • @permission
  • @es

Feature has failed Scenarios passed : 50%, Scenarios failed : 50%

Feature: Validate Role wise Permissions

  • @javascript
  • @api

Scenario Outline: Validate Author has no permission to access Translation page of any term

  1. Given I am logged in as a user with the "author" role Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAuthenticatedByRole()
  2. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  3. And I should not have access of "/en/taxonomy/term/1/translations" FeatureContext::iShouldNotHaveAccessOf()
  4. Given I am logged in as a user with the "editor" role Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAuthenticatedByRole()
  5. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  6. And I should not have access of "/en/taxonomy/term/1/translations" FeatureContext::iShouldNotHaveAccessOf()
  7. Given I am logged in as a user with the "author" role Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAuthenticatedByRole()
  8. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  9. And I should not have access of "/en/taxonomy/term/2/translations" FeatureContext::iShouldNotHaveAccessOf()
  10. Given I am logged in as a user with the "editor" role Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAuthenticatedByRole()
  11. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  12. And I should not have access of "/en/taxonomy/term/2/translations" FeatureContext::iShouldNotHaveAccessOf()
  13. Given I am logged in as a user with the "author" role Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAuthenticatedByRole()
  14. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()

Feature: Normal search validation with

  • @api
  • @javascript
  • @es
  • @en
  • @smoke
  • @positive

Scenario Outline: Searching with a single word, two words with "OR", two words with "AND" condition in spanish and english

  1. Given I am on "/en" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  2. And I fill in "edit-keys" with "deep" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  3. And I press the "Search" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  4. And I wait for AJAX to finish Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::iWaitForAjaxToFinish()
  5. And I scroll "#block-umami-content" into view FeatureContext::scrollIntoView()
  6. And I wait 2 second FeatureContext::wait()
  7. And I should see the heading "Search for deep" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()
  8. Then I should see "deep" in the "main" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  9. Given I am on "/en" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  10. And I fill in "edit-keys" with "deep OR Test" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  11. And I press the "Search" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  12. And I wait for AJAX to finish Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::iWaitForAjaxToFinish()
  13. And I scroll "#block-umami-content" into view FeatureContext::scrollIntoView()
  14. And I wait 2 second FeatureContext::wait()
  15. And I should see the heading "Search for deep OR Test" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()
  16. Then I should see "deep" in the "main" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  17. Given I am on "/en" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  18. And I fill in "edit-keys" with "deep AND Test" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  19. And I press the "Search" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  20. And I wait for AJAX to finish Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::iWaitForAjaxToFinish()
  21. And I scroll "#block-umami-content" into view FeatureContext::scrollIntoView()
  22. And I wait 2 second FeatureContext::wait()
  23. And I should see the heading "Search for deep AND Test" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()
  24. Then I should see "Your search yielded no results." in the "main" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  25. Given I am on "/es" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  26. And I fill in "edit-keys" with "Quiche" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  27. And I press the "Buscar" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  28. And I wait for AJAX to finish Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::iWaitForAjaxToFinish()
  29. And I scroll "#block-umami-content" into view FeatureContext::scrollIntoView()
  30. And I wait 2 second FeatureContext::wait()
  31. And I should see the heading "Buscar por Quiche" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()
  32. Then I should see "Quiche" in the "main" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  33. Given I am on "/es" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  34. And I fill in "edit-keys" with "Quiche OR Test" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  35. And I press the "Buscar" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  36. And I wait for AJAX to finish Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::iWaitForAjaxToFinish()
  37. And I scroll "#block-umami-content" into view FeatureContext::scrollIntoView()
  38. And I wait 2 second FeatureContext::wait()
  39. And I should see the heading "Buscar por Quiche OR Test" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()
  40. Then I should see "Quiche" in the "main" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  41. Given I am on "/es" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  42. And I fill in "edit-keys" with "Quiche AND Test" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  43. And I press the "Buscar" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  44. And I wait for AJAX to finish Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::iWaitForAjaxToFinish()
  45. And I scroll "#block-umami-content" into view FeatureContext::scrollIntoView()
  46. And I wait 2 second FeatureContext::wait()
  47. And I should see the heading "Buscar por Quiche AND Test" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()
  48. Then I should see "Su búsqueda no produjo resultados" in the "main" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  • @en
  • @es
  • @neg

Scenario Outline: Searching with blank value and with space and validating result

  1. Given I am on "/en" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  2. When I fill in "edit-keys" with "" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  3. And I press the "Search" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  4. And I wait for AJAX to finish Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::iWaitForAjaxToFinish()
  5. Then I should see the error message "Please enter some keywords." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MessageContext::assertErrorVisible()
  6. And I scroll ".layout-content" into view FeatureContext::scrollIntoView()
  7. And I wait 3 second FeatureContext::wait()
  8. And I should see the heading "Search" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()
  9. And I should see "Your search yielded no results." in the "main" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  10. Given I am on "/en" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  11. When I fill in "edit-keys" with " " Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  12. And I press the "Search" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  13. And I wait for AJAX to finish Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::iWaitForAjaxToFinish()
  14. Then I should see the error message "Please enter some keywords." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MessageContext::assertErrorVisible()
  15. And I scroll ".layout-content" into view FeatureContext::scrollIntoView()
  16. And I wait 3 second FeatureContext::wait()
  17. And I should see the heading "Search" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()
  18. And I should see "Your search yielded no results." in the "main" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  19. Given I am on "/es" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  20. When I fill in "edit-keys" with "" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  21. And I press the "Buscar" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  22. And I wait for AJAX to finish Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::iWaitForAjaxToFinish()
  23. Then I should see the error message "Por favor, escriba algunas palabras clave." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MessageContext::assertErrorVisible()
  24. And I scroll ".layout-content" into view FeatureContext::scrollIntoView()
  25. And I wait 3 second FeatureContext::wait()
  26. And I should see the heading "Buscar" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()
  27. And I should see "Su búsqueda no produjo resultados" in the "main" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  28. Given I am on "/es" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  29. When I fill in "edit-keys" with " " Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  30. And I press the "Buscar" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  31. And I wait for AJAX to finish Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::iWaitForAjaxToFinish()
  32. Then I should see the error message "Por favor, escriba algunas palabras clave." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MessageContext::assertErrorVisible()
  33. And I scroll ".layout-content" into view FeatureContext::scrollIntoView()
  34. And I wait 3 second FeatureContext::wait()
  35. And I should see the heading "Buscar" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()
  36. And I should see "Su búsqueda no produjo resultados" in the "main" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
Feature has passed

Feature: Advance Search Validation

  • @api
  • @javascript
  • @es
  • @smoke

Scenario: Enter a keyword in `Containing any of the words` and verify the search results

  1. Given I am logged in as a user with the "administrator" role Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAuthenticatedByRole()
  2. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  3. And I am on "/en/search/node" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  4. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  5. When I press the "Advanced search" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  6. Then I should see "Keywords" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  7. And I should see "Types" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  8. And I should see "Languages" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  9. And I fill in "Containing any of the words" with "Vegan" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  10. And I press the "edit-submit--2" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  11. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  12. And I should see "Vegan chocolate and nut brownies" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  13. And I should see "Vegan" in the "strong" element Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertElementContainsText()
  • @es

Scenario: Enter a keyword in `Que contenga cualquiera de las palabras` and verify the search results

  1. Given I am logged in as a user with the "administrator" role Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAuthenticatedByRole()
  2. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  3. And I am on "/es/search/node" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  4. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  5. When I press the "Búsqueda avanzada" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  6. Then I should see "Palabras clave" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  7. And I should see "Tipos" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  8. And I should see "Idiomas" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  9. And I fill in "Que contenga cualquiera de las palabras" with "veganos" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  10. And I press the "edit-submit--2" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  11. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  12. And I should see "Bizcochos veganos de chocolate y nueces" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  13. And I should see "veganos" in the "strong" element Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertElementContainsText()
Feature has passed

Feature: Search Validation

  • @api
  • @javascript
  • @en
  • @smoke

Scenario: Select a combination of Keywords, Article type and Language and verify Key Results

  1. Given I am logged in as a user with the "administrator" role Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAuthenticatedByRole()
  2. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  3. And I am on "/en/search/node" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  4. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  5. When I press the "Advanced search" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  6. Then I should see "Keywords" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  7. And I should see "Types" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  8. And I should see "Languages" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  9. And I fill in "Containing any of the words" with "" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  10. And I fill in "Containing the phrase" with "Use a little of the sunflower oil to grease an 8 inch square baking tin (or similar size) and line the tin with greaseproof paper." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  11. And I fill in "Containing none of the words" with "" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  12. And I check the box "edit-type-recipe" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertCheckBox()
  13. And I check the box "edit-language-en" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertCheckBox()
  14. And I press the "edit-submit--2" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  15. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  16. And I should see "Vegan chocolate and nut brownies" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  • @es

Scenario: Select a combination of Keywords, Article type and Language and verify Key Results

  1. Given I am logged in as a user with the "administrator" role Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAuthenticatedByRole()
  2. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  3. And I am on "/es/search/node" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  4. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  5. When I press the "Búsqueda avanzada" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  6. Then I should see "Palabras clave" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  7. And I should see "Tipos" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  8. And I should see "Idiomas" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  9. And I fill in "Que contenga cualquiera de las palabras" with "" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  10. And I fill in "Que contenga la frase" with "Engrasar una bandeja de hornear de unos 20 cm (o tamaño similar) con un poco del aceite de girasol y cubrir con papel de hornear." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  11. And I fill in "Que no contenga ninguna de las palabras" with "" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  12. And I check the box "edit-type-recipe" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertCheckBox()
  13. And I check the box "edit-language-es" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertCheckBox()
  14. And I press the "edit-submit--2" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  15. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  16. And I should see "Bizcochos veganos de chocolate y nueces" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()

  17. And I wait for the AJAX to finish FeatureContext::iWaitForTheAjaxToFinish()

Feature: Advance Search Validation for not specified

  • @api
  • @javascript
  • @en
  • @smoke

Scenario: Verify the user is able to see test results for English word, when english is selected

  1. Given I am logged in as a user with the "administrator" role Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAuthenticatedByRole()
  2. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  3. And I am on "/en/search/node" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  4. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  5. When I press the "Advanced search" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  6. Then I should see "Keywords" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  7. And I should see "Types" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  8. And I should see "Languages" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  9. And I fill in "Containing any of the words" with "Vegan" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  10. And I check the box "edit-type-recipe" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertCheckBox()
  11. And I check the box "edit-language-und" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertCheckBox()
  12. And I press the "edit-submit--2" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  13. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  14. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  15. And I should see "Your search yielded no results." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  • @es

Scenario: Verify the user is able to see test results for spanish word in spanish

  1. Given I am logged in as a user with the "administrator" role Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAuthenticatedByRole()
  2. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  3. And I am on "/es/search/node" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  4. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  5. When I press the "Búsqueda avanzada" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  6. Then I should see "Palabras clave" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  7. And I should see "Tipos" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  8. And I should see "Idiomas" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  9. And I fill in "Que contenga cualquiera de las palabras" with "veganos" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  10. And I fill in "Que contenga la frase" with "Engrasar una bandeja de hornear de unos 20 cm (o tamaño similar) con un poco del aceite de girasol y cubrir con papel de hornear." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  11. And I fill in "Que no contenga ninguna de las palabras" with "Artículos" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  12. And I check the box "edit-type-recipe" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertCheckBox()
  13. And I check the box "edit-language-und" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertCheckBox()
  14. And I press the "edit-submit--2" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  15. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  16. And I should see "Su búsqueda no produjo resultados" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
Feature has passed

Feature: Advance Search Validation

  • @api
  • @javascript
  • @en
  • @smoke

Scenario: Verify the user is able to see test results for English word, when english is selected

  1. Given I am logged in as a user with the "administrator" role Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAuthenticatedByRole()
  2. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  3. And I am on "/en/search/node" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  4. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  5. When I press the "Advanced search" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  6. Then I should see "Keywords" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  7. And I should see "Types" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  8. And I should see "Languages" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  9. And I fill in "Containing any of the words" with "Vegan" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  10. And I fill in "Containing the phrase" with "Use a little of the sunflower oil to grease an 8 inch square baking tin (or similar size) and line the tin with greaseproof paper." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  11. And I fill in "Containing none of the words" with "article" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  12. And I check the box "edit-type-recipe" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertCheckBox()
  13. And I check the box "edit-language-en" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertCheckBox()
  14. And I press the "edit-submit--2" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  15. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  16. And I should see "Vegan chocolate and nut brownies" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  17. And I should see "Vegan" in the "strong" element Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertElementContainsText()
  • @es

  8. And I should see "Idiomas" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  9. And I fill in "Que contenga cualquiera de las palabras" with "veganos" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  10. And I fill in "Que contenga la frase" with "Engrasar una bandeja de hornear de unos 20 cm (o tamaño similar) con un poco del aceite de girasol y cubrir con papel de hornear." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()

  12. And I check the box "edit-type-recipe" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertCheckBox()
  13. And I check the box "edit-language-es" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertCheckBox()

  17. And I should see "veganos" in the "strong" element Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertElementContainsText()

Feature: Advance Search Validation by selecting language option

  • @api
  • @javascript
  • @en
  • @smoke

Scenario: Verify the user is able to see test results for English word, when english is selected

  1. Given I am logged in as a user with the "administrator" role Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAuthenticatedByRole()
  2. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  3. And I am on "/en/search/node" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  4. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  5. When I press the "Advanced search" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  6. Then I should see "Keywords" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  7. And I should see "Types" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  8. And I should see "Languages" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  9. And I fill in "Containing any of the words" with "Vegan" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  10. And I fill in "Containing the phrase" with "Use a little of the sunflower oil to grease an 8 inch square baking tin (or similar size) and line the tin with greaseproof paper." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  11. And I fill in "Containing none of the words" with "article" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  12. And I check the box "edit-type-recipe" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertCheckBox()
  13. And I check the box "edit-language-en" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertCheckBox()
  14. And I press the "edit-submit--2" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  15. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  16. And I should see "Vegan chocolate and nut brownies" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  17. And I should see "Vegan" in the "strong" element Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertElementContainsText()

Feature: Search with Content Moderation stage

  • @javascript
  • @api
  • @javascript

Scenario: Validate search of a node in different content moderation state

  1. Given I am logged in as a user with the "administrator" role Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAuthenticatedByRole()
  2. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  3. And I am on "/en/node/add/recipe" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  4. Then I should see "Create Recipe" in the "header" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  5. When I fill in "Recipe Name" with "Behat_recipe_search_ContentModeration" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  6. And I fill in "Preparation time" with "10" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  7. And I fill in "Cooking time" with "60" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  8. And I fill in "Number of servings" with "4" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  9. And I fill in "edit-field-recipe-category-target-id" with "Main courses" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  10. And I fill in "Tags" with "Vegetarian" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  11. And I press the "edit-field-media-image-open-button" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  12. And I wait for the AJAX to finish FeatureContext::iWaitForTheAjaxToFinish()
  13. And I should see "Add or select media" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  14. And I should see "Deep mediterranean quiche" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  15. And I check the box "media_library_select_form[0]" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertCheckBox()
  16. And I click on the element with xpath "//button[text()='Insert selected']" FeatureContext::iClickOnTheElementWithXPath()
  17. And I wait for the AJAX to finish FeatureContext::iWaitForTheAjaxToFinish()
  18. And I fill in wysiwyg on field "Summary" with "Test Data" FeatureContext::iFillInWysiwygOnFieldWith()
  19. And I fill in "Ingredients" with "Cook1" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  20. And I fill in wysiwyg on field "Recipe instruction" with "Test Data" FeatureContext::iFillInWysiwygOnFieldWith()
  21. And I press the "Save" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  22. And I save the node url FeatureContext::iSaveTheNodeUrl()
  23. Then I log out Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAnonymousUser()
  24. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  25. Given I am an anonymous user Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAnonymousUser()
  26. And I am on "/" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  27. Then I should see "Search" in the "preheader" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  28. When I fill in "edit-keys" with "Behat_recipe_search_ContentModeration" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  29. And I press the "Search" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  30. And I wait for AJAX to finish Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::iWaitForAjaxToFinish()
  31. Then I should see "Your search yielded no results." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  32. Given I am logged in as a user with the "editor" role Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAuthenticatedByRole()
  33. And I navigate to the node url FeatureContext::iAccessNodeUrl()
  34. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  35. And I click "Edit" in the "tabs" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionLinkFollow()
  36. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  37. And I select "Published" from "Change to" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::selectOption()
  38. And I press the "Save" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  39. And I run cron Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertCron()
  40. And the cache has been cleared Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertCacheClear()
  41. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  42. Then I log out Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAnonymousUser()
  43. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  44. Given I am an anonymous user Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAnonymousUser()
  45. And I am on "/" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  46. When I fill in "edit-keys" with "Behat_recipe_search_ContentModeration" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  47. And I press the "Search" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  48. And I wait for AJAX to finish Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::iWaitForAjaxToFinish()
  49. Then I should see "Behat_recipe_search_ContentModeration" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  50. And I should see "Behat_recipe_search_ContentModeration" in the "strong" element Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertElementContainsText()
Feature has passed

Feature: Validate Advance search of a node in different content moderation state

Created node with Drupal API

  • @javascript
  • @api
  • @javascript

Scenario: 1. Validate admin should not be able to search draft content 2. Admin should be able to search published node

  1. Given I am logged in as a user with the "administrator" role Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAuthenticatedByRole()
  2. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  3. And I am viewing an "article" content: Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertViewingNode()
     
    titleThe guide to grow your own spinach
    bodyGrowing anything at home requires taking care of it as you care for your personal belongings. Growing spinach is no different. You don’t want to plant the seeds and forget about them. Pay your plants a visit at least once a day.
    languageen
    tagsGrow your own
  4. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  5. And I save the node url FeatureContext::iSaveTheNodeUrl()
  6. And I am on "/en/search/node" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  7. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  8. When I press the "Advanced search" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  9. Then I should see "Keywords" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  10. And I should see "Types" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  11. And I should see "Languages" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  12. And I fill in "Containing any of the words" with "spinach" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  13. And I fill in "Containing the phrase" with "Growing anything at home requires taking care of it as you care for your personal belongings. Growing spinach is no different. You don’t want to plant the seeds and forget about them. Pay your plants a visit at least once a day." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  14. And I fill in "Containing none of the words" with "recipe" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  15. And I check the box "edit-type-article" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertCheckBox()
  16. And I check the box "edit-language-en" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertCheckBox()
  17. And I press the "edit-submit--2" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  18. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  19. And I scroll ".item-list" into view FeatureContext::scrollIntoView()
  20. And I should not see "The guide to grow your own spinach" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageNotContainsText()
  21. And I should not see "spinach" in the "strong" element Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertElementNotContainsText()
  22. When I navigate to the node url FeatureContext::iAccessNodeUrl()
  23. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  24. And I should see "Log message" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  25. And I fill in "Log message" with "publish node" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  26. And I press the "Apply" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  27. Then I run cron Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertCron()
  28. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  29. And I am on "/en/search/node" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  30. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  31. When I press the "Advanced search" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  32. Then I should see "Keywords" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  33. And I should see "Types" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  34. And I should see "Languages" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  35. And I fill in "Containing any of the words" with "spinach" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  36. And I fill in "Containing the phrase" with "Growing anything at home requires taking care of it as you care for your personal belongings. Growing spinach is no different. You don’t want to plant the seeds and forget about them. Pay your plants a visit at least once a day." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  37. And I fill in "Containing none of the words" with "recipe" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  38. And I check the box "edit-type-article" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertCheckBox()
  39. And I check the box "edit-language-en" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertCheckBox()
  40. And I press the "edit-submit--2" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  41. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  42. And I scroll ".item-list" into view FeatureContext::scrollIntoView()
  43. And I should see "The guide to grow your own spinach" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  44. And I should see "spinach" in the "strong" element Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertElementContainsText()
Feature has passed

Feature: Footer link and image validation

  • @api
  • @javascript
  • @en
  • @smoke

Scenario Outline: Verify languages, search bar, my account, and logout buttons

  1. Given I am on "/" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  2. When I scroll ".layout-content-bottom" into view FeatureContext::scrollIntoView()
  3. Then I should see "Alcohol free" in the "content_bottom" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  4. And I hover over the "Alcohol free" link FeatureContext::iHoverOverLink()
  5. And I am on "/en/contact" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  6. When I scroll ".layout-content-bottom" into view FeatureContext::scrollIntoView()
  7. Then I should see "Alcohol free" in the "content_bottom" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  8. And I hover over the "Alcohol free" link FeatureContext::iHoverOverLink()
  9. And I am on "/en/search/node" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  10. When I scroll ".layout-content-bottom" into view FeatureContext::scrollIntoView()
  11. Then I should see "Alcohol free" in the "content_bottom" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  12. And I hover over the "Alcohol free" link FeatureContext::iHoverOverLink()
  13. Given I am on "/" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  14. When I scroll ".layout-content-bottom" into view FeatureContext::scrollIntoView()
  15. Then I should see "Baked" in the "content_bottom" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  16. And I hover over the "Baked" link FeatureContext::iHoverOverLink()
  17. And I am on "/en/contact" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  18. When I scroll ".layout-content-bottom" into view FeatureContext::scrollIntoView()
  19. Then I should see "Baked" in the "content_bottom" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  20. And I hover over the "Baked" link FeatureContext::iHoverOverLink()
  21. And I am on "/en/search/node" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()

Scenario Outline: Verify Copyright text and Terms and Conditions

  1. Given I am on "/" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  2. And I scroll "#block-umami-disclaimer" into view FeatureContext::scrollIntoView()
  3. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  4. Then I should see "Umami Magazine & Umami Publications is a fictional magazine and publisher for illustrative purposes only." in the "bottom" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  5. And I am on "/en/contact" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  6. And I scroll "#block-umami-disclaimer" into view FeatureContext::scrollIntoView()
  7. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  8. Then I should see "Umami Magazine & Umami Publications is a fictional magazine and publisher for illustrative purposes only." in the "bottom" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  9. And I am on "/en/search/node" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  10. And I scroll "#block-umami-disclaimer" into view FeatureContext::scrollIntoView()
  11. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  12. Then I should see "Umami Magazine & Umami Publications is a fictional magazine and publisher for illustrative purposes only." in the "bottom" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  13. Given I am on "/" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  14. And I scroll "#block-umami-disclaimer" into view FeatureContext::scrollIntoView()
  15. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  16. Then I should see "© 2021 Terms & Conditions" in the "bottom" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  17. And I am on "/en/contact" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  18. And I scroll "#block-umami-disclaimer" into view FeatureContext::scrollIntoView()
  19. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  20. Then I should see "© 2021 Terms & Conditions" in the "bottom" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  21. And I am on "/en/search/node" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  22. And I scroll "#block-umami-disclaimer" into view FeatureContext::scrollIntoView()
  23. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  24. Then I should see "© 2021 Terms & Conditions" in the "bottom" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()

  6. And I am on "/en/contact" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  7. Then I should see "English" in the "preheader" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  8. And I hover over the "English" link FeatureContext::iHoverOverLink()

  10. And I hover over the "Search" link FeatureContext::iHoverOverLink()

  12. Then I should see "English" in the "preheader" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  13. And I hover over the "English" link FeatureContext::iHoverOverLink()

Scenario: Verify my account and logout buttons

  1. Given I am logged in as a user with the "administrator" role Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::assertAuthenticatedByRole()
  2. And I am on "/" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()

  5. Then I should see "Log out" in the "preheader" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()

  15. Then I should see "Log out" in the "preheader" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()

Feature: Search Validation

  • @api
  • @javascript
  • @api
  • @content
  • @javascript
  • @creation
  • @en

Scenario: 1.Create tags and Validate article is not getting created if mandatory fields are marked empty

  1. Given I am on "/en/user/login" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  2. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  3. Then I fill in "Username" with "admin" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  4. And I fill in "Password" with "admin" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  5. And I press "Log in" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  6. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  7. When I am viewing a "tags" term with the name "Knowledge" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::createTerm()
  8. Then I should see the heading "Knowledge" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()
  9. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  10. And I am on "en/node/add/article" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  11. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  12. And I should not see "Access denied" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageNotContainsText()
  13. And print current URL Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::printCurrentUrl()
  14. Then I should see "Create Article" in the "header" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  15. When I fill in "Title" with " " Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  16. And I fill in wysiwyg on field "Body" with "This is the test body" FeatureContext::iFillInWysiwygOnFieldWith()
  17. And I fill in "Tags" with "Knowledge" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  18. And I press the "Add media" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  19. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  20. And I attach the file "fff.png" to "files[upload]" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::attachFileToField()
  21. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  22. And I fill in "media[0][fields][field_media_image][0][alt]" with "this is alttext" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  23. Then I click on the element with xpath "//button[text()='Save']" FeatureContext::iClickOnTheElementWithXPath()
  24. And I click on the element with xpath "//button[text()='Insert selected']" FeatureContext::iClickOnTheElementWithXPath()
  25. And I select "Published" from "Save as" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::selectOption()
  26. Then I press the "Save" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  27. Then I should not see the success message "content has been created." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MessageContext::assertNotSuccessMessage()
  • @api
  • @content
  • @javascript
  • @creation
  • @es

  21. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()

  28. Then I should not see the success message "se ha creado." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MessageContext::assertNotSuccessMessage()

Scenario: Verify English article content is created successfully, updated successfully and Deleted successfully

  1. Given I am on "/en/user/login" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  2. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  3. Then I fill in "Username" with "admin" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  4. And I fill in "Password" with "admin" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  5. And I press "Log in" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  6. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  7. When I am viewing a "tags" term with the name "Behat" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::createTerm()
  8. Then I should see the heading "Behat" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()
  9. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  10. And I am on "en/node/add/article" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  11. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  12. And I should not see "Access denied" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageNotContainsText()
  13. And print current URL Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::printCurrentUrl()
  14. Then I should see "Create Article" in the "header" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  15. When I fill in "Title" with "Behat_article" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  16. And I fill in wysiwyg on field "Body" with "This is the test body" FeatureContext::iFillInWysiwygOnFieldWith()
  17. And I fill in "Tags" with "Behat" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  18. And I press the "Add media" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  19. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  20. And I attach the file "fff.png" to "files[upload]" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::attachFileToField()
  21. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  22. And I fill in "media[0][fields][field_media_image][0][alt]" with "this is alttext" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  23. Then I click on the element with xpath "//button[text()='Save']" FeatureContext::iClickOnTheElementWithXPath()
  24. And I click on the element with xpath "//button[text()='Insert selected']" FeatureContext::iClickOnTheElementWithXPath()
  25. And I select "Published" from "Save as" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::selectOption()
  26. Then I press the "Save" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  27. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  28. And I save the node url FeatureContext::iSaveTheNodeUrl()
  29. Then I should see "Behat_article has been created." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  30. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  31. And I navigate to the node url FeatureContext::iAccessNodeUrl()
  32. And I click "Edit" in the "tabs" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionLinkFollow()
  33. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  34. And I fill in wysiwyg on field "Body" with "New test Body" FeatureContext::iFillInWysiwygOnFieldWith()
  35. Then I press the "Save" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  36. Then I should see "Behat_article has been updated." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  37. And I navigate to the node url FeatureContext::iAccessNodeUrl()
  38. And I click "Delete" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertClick()
  39. Then I should see "Are you sure you want to delete the content item Behat_article?" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  40. And I press the "Delete" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  41. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  42. And I should see "The Article Behat_article has been deleted." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()

  • @es

  1. Given I am on "/es/user/login" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  2. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  3. Then I fill in "Nombre de usuario" with "admin" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  4. And I fill in "Contraseña" with "admin" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  5. And I press "Iniciar sesión" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  6. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()

  8. Then I should see the heading "Conocimiento" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()

  17. And I fill in "Etiquetas" with "Knowledge" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  18. And I press the "Añadir contenido multimedia" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  19. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  20. And I attach the file "fff.png" to "files[upload]" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::attachFileToField()
  21. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  22. And I fill in "Texto alternativo" with "this is alttext" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  23. Then I click on the element with xpath "//button[text()='Guardar']" FeatureContext::iClickOnTheElementWithXPath()
  24. And I click on the element with xpath "//button[text()='Insertar seleccionado']" FeatureContext::iClickOnTheElementWithXPath()
  25. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  26. And I select "Publicado" from "Guardar como" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::selectOption()
  27. And I press the "Guardar" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  28. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  29. And I save the node url FeatureContext::iSaveTheNodeUrl()
  30. Then I should see the success message "Artículo Behat_article se ha creado." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MessageContext::assertSuccessMessage()
  31. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()
  32. And I navigate to the node url FeatureContext::iAccessNodeUrl()
  33. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  34. And I click "Editar" in the "tabs" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionLinkFollow()
  35. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  36. And I fill in wysiwyg on field "Cuerpo" with "Complete el cuerpo con datos ficticios actualizados" FeatureContext::iFillInWysiwygOnFieldWith()
  37. And I press the "Guardar" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  38. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  39. And I should see "Artículo Behat_article ha sido actualizado." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText() 
    The text "Artculo Behat_article ha sido actualizado." was not found anywhere in the text of the current page.
    Screenshot
  40. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  41. And I navigate to the node url FeatureContext::iAccessNodeUrl()
  42. And I click "Eliminar" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertClick()
  43. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  44. And I should see "¿Está seguro de querer borrar Behat_article del tipo elemento de contenido?" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
  45. And I press the "Eliminar" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  46. And I should see "El Artículo Behat_article ha sido eliminado." Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageContainsText()
Feature has failed Scenarios passed : 75%, Scenarios failed : 25%

Feature: Search Validation

  • @api
  • @javascript
  • @api
  • @content
  • @javascript
  • @creation
  • @en

Scenario: 1.Create tags and Validate article is not getting created if mandatory fields are marked empty

  1. Given I login as "Administrator" user FeatureContext::iLoginAsUser()
  2. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  3. When I am viewing a "tags" term with the name "behat_recipe_tag" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::createTerm()
  4. Then I should see the heading "behat_recipe_tag" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()
  5. When I am viewing a "recipe_category" term with the name "behat_recipe_category" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\DrupalContext::createTerm()
  6. Then I should see the heading "behat_recipe_category" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertHeading()
  7. And I am on "/en/node/add/recipe" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::visit()
  8. And I should not see "Access denied" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertPageNotContainsText()
  9. Then I should see "Create Recipe" in the "header" region Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::assertRegionText()
  10. When I fill in "Recipe Name" with "Behat_recipe_CRUD" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  11. And I fill in "Preparation time" with "10" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  12. And I fill in "Cooking time" with "60" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  13. And I fill in "Number of servings" with "4" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  14. And I fill in "edit-field-recipe-category-target-id" with "behat_recipe_category" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  15. And I fill in "Tags" with "behat_recipe_tag" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::fillField()
  16. And I press the "Add media" button Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::pressButton()
  17. And I wait for the page to be loaded FeatureContext::pageLoad()
  18. And I attach the file "fff.png" to "files[upload]" Drupal\DrupalExtension\Context\MinkContext::attachFileToField()
  19. And I wait 5 second FeatureContext::wait()

Feature: Contact form validation in english

In order to verify the contact from submission in a correct way
It should accept only correct value
For incorrect or blank field it should display notification
On submission of the form it should show a notification message

api javascript

Feature: Content Moderation Steps and Role-wise permission in English and Spanish

1. Created a node in Draft with "Author" role checked below permissions:
- Add node
- Edit Node
- Delete Node
- Revision
- Translate
- Layout
2. Tried to access the draft node with Anonymous User
3. Edited Draft node with "Editor" role to publish it and role checked below permissions:
- Add node
- Edit Node
- Delete Node
- Revision
- Translate
- Layout
4. Trying to access the Publish node with Anonymous User
5. Edited Published node with "Editor" role and changed status to Archive
6. Trying to access the Archive node with Anonymous User
7. Validating that Editor can revert the revision
8. Accessed the Archived node with "Administrator" role to delete it and role checked below permissions:
- Add node
- Edit Node
- Delete Node
- Revision
- Translate
- Layout

  • And I fill in "Your email address" with ""

Feature: Content Moderation Steps and Role-wise permission in English and Spanish

1. Created a node in Draft with "Author" role checked below permissions:
- Add node
- Edit Node
- Delete Node
- Revision
- Translate
- Layout
2. Tried to access the draft node with Anonymous User
3. Edited Draft node with "Editor" role to publish it and role checked below permissions:
- Add node
- Edit Node
- Delete Node
- Revision
- Translate
- Layout
4. Trying to access the Publish node with Anonymous User
5. Edited Published node with "Editor" role and changed status to Archive
6. Trying to access the Archive node with Anonymous User
7. Validating that Editor can revert the revision
8. Accessed the Archived node with "Administrator" role to delete it and role checked below permissions:
- Add node
- Edit Node
- Delete Node
- Revision
- Translate
- Layout

javascript api
40% Complete (success)
40% Complete (success)
40% Complete (success)

Scenario: Content moderation state in English Create -> Draft -> Publish -> Archive -> Delete
moderation roles permission en

  • Given I am logged in as a user with the "author" role
  • And I wait 5 second
  • And I am on "/en/node/add/recipe"
  • And I should not see "Access denied"
  • Then I should see "Create Recipe" in the "header" region
  • When I fill in "Recipe Name" with "Behat_recipe_1"
  • And I select "English" from "Language"
  • And I fill in "Preparation time" with "10"
  • And I fill in "Cooking time" with "60"
  • And I fill in "Number of servings" with "4"
  • And I fill in "edit-field-recipe-category-target-id" with "Main courses"
  • And I fill in "Tags" with "Vegetarian"
  • And I wait for the AJAX to finish
  • And I press the "Add media" button
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I check the box "media_library_select_form[1]"
  • And I click on the element with xpath "//button[text()='Insert selected']"
  • And I wait for the AJAX to finish
  • And I fill in wysiwyg on field "Summary" with "Test Data"
  • And I fill in "Ingredients" with "Cook1"
  • And I fill in wysiwyg on field "Recipe instruction" with "Test Data"
  • And I click the ".seven-details__summary" element
  • And I fill in "edit-path-0-alias" with "/recipes/behat_recipe_moderation"
  • And I press the "Save" button
  • Then I should see "Recipe Behat_recipe_1 has been created."
  • And I save the node url

    | http://localhost:8888/en/recipes/behat_recipe_moderation

  • And I click "Edit" in the "tabs" region
  • Then I should not see the heading "Access denied"
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I navigate to the node url

Scenario: Check with Anonymous User and Authenticated user can access the nodes in view mo
api en smoke

  • Given I am an anonymous user
  • And I should have access of "/en"

    (Element matching css ".page-title" not found.)

  • When I am logged in as a user with the "Authenticated user" role
  • And I should have access of "/en"
  • Given I am an anonymous user
  • And I should have access of "/en/recipes/fiery-chili-sauce"

  • And I should have access of "/en/recipes/fiery-chili-sauce"
  • Given I am an anonymous user
  • And I should have access of "/en/tags/alcohol-free"
  • When I am logged in as a user with the "Authenticated user" role
  • And I should have access of "/en/tags/alcohol-free"
  • Given I am an anonymous user
  • And I should have access of "/en/tags/baked"
  • When I am logged in as a user with the "Authenticated user" role
  • And I should have access of "/en/tags/baked"

  • And I should have access of "/en/tags/baking"
  • When I am logged in as a user with the "Authenticated user" role
  • And I should have access of "/en/tags/baking"
  • Given I am an anonymous user
  • And I should have access of "/en/tags/breakfast"
  • When I am logged in as a user with the "Authenticated user" role
