Feature: Normal search validation with

api javascript
40% Complete (success)
40% Complete (success)
40% Complete (success)

Scenario: Searching with a single word, two words with "OR", two words with "AND" condition in spanish and english
es en smoke positive

  • Given I am on "/en"
  • And I fill in "edit-keys" with "deep"
  • And I press the "Search" button
  • And I wait for AJAX to finish
  • And I scroll "#block-umami-content" into view
  • And I wait 2 second
  • And I should see the heading "Search for deep"
  • Then I should see "deep" in the "main" region
  • Given I am on "/en"
  • And I fill in "edit-keys" with "deep OR Test"
  • And I press the "Search" button
  • And I wait for AJAX to finish
  • And I scroll "#block-umami-content" into view
  • And I wait 2 second
  • And I should see the heading "Search for deep OR Test"
  • Then I should see "deep" in the "main" region
  • Given I am on "/en"
  • And I fill in "edit-keys" with "deep AND Test"
  • And I press the "Search" button
  • And I wait for AJAX to finish
  • And I scroll "#block-umami-content" into view
  • And I wait 2 second
  • And I should see the heading "Search for deep AND Test"
  • Then I should see "Your search yielded no results." in the "main" region
  • Given I am on "/es"
  • And I fill in "edit-keys" with "Quiche"
  • And I press the "Buscar" button
  • And I wait for AJAX to finish
  • And I scroll "#block-umami-content" into view
  • And I wait 2 second
  • And I should see the heading "Buscar por Quiche"
  • Then I should see "Quiche" in the "main" region
  • Given I am on "/es"
  • And I fill in "edit-keys" with "Quiche OR Test"
  • And I press the "Buscar" button
  • And I wait for AJAX to finish
  • And I scroll "#block-umami-content" into view
  • And I wait 2 second
  • And I should see the heading "Buscar por Quiche OR Test"
  • Then I should see "Quiche" in the "main" region
  • Given I am on "/es"
  • And I fill in "edit-keys" with "Quiche AND Test"
  • And I press the "Buscar" button
  • And I wait for AJAX to finish
  • And I scroll "#block-umami-content" into view
  • And I wait 2 second
  • And I should see the heading "Buscar por Quiche AND Test"
  • Then I should see "Su bsqueda no produjo resultados" in the "main" region

Feature: Advance Search Validation

api javascript
40% Complete (success)
40% Complete (success)
40% Complete (success)

Scenario: Enter a keyword in `Containing any of the words` and verify the search results
es smoke

  • Given I am logged in as a user with the "administrator" role
  • And I wait 5 second
  • And I am on "/en/search/node"
  • And I wait 5 second
  • When I press the "Advanced search" button
  • Then I should see "Keywords"
  • And I should see "Types"
  • And I should see "Languages"
  • And I fill in "Containing any of the words" with "Vegan"
  • And I press the "edit-submit--2" button
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I should see "Vegan chocolate and nut brownies"
  • And I should see "Vegan" in the "strong" element

Scenario: Enter a keyword in `Que contenga cualquiera de las palabras` and verify the search results
es

  • Given I am logged in as a user with the "administrator" role
  • And I wait 5 second
  • And I am on "/es/search/node"
  • And I wait 5 second
  • When I press the "Bsqueda avanzada" button
  • Then I should see "Palabras clave"
  • And I should see "Tipos"
  • And I should see "Idiomas"
  • And I fill in "Que contenga cualquiera de las palabras" with "veganos"
  • And I press the "edit-submit--2" button
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I should see "Bizcochos veganos de chocolate y nueces"
  • And I should see "veganos" in the "strong" element

  • And I check the box "edit-type-recipe"
  • And I check the box "edit-language-en"
  • And I press the "edit-submit--2" button
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I should see "Vegan chocolate and nut brownies"

Feature: Advance Search Validation by selecting language option

api javascript
40% Complete (success)
40% Complete (success)
40% Complete (success)

Scenario: Verify the user is able to see test results for English word, when english is selected
en smoke

  • Given I am logged in as a user with the "administrator" role
  • And I wait 5 second
  • And I am on "/en/search/node"
  • And I wait 5 second
  • When I press the "Advanced search" button
  • Then I should see "Keywords"
  • And I should see "Types"
  • And I should see "Languages"
  • And I fill in "Containing any of the words" with "Vegan"
  • And I fill in "Containing the phrase" with "Use a little of the sunflower oil to grease an 8 inch square baking tin (or similar size) and line the tin with greaseproof paper."
  • And I fill in "Containing none of the words" with "article"
  • And I check the box "edit-type-recipe"
  • And I check the box "edit-language-en"
  • And I press the "edit-submit--2" button
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I should see "Vegan chocolate and nut brownies"
  • And I should see "Vegan" in the "strong" element

Scenario: Verify the user is unable to see test results for English word in spanish
en smoke

  • Given I am logged in as a user with the "administrator" role
  • And I wait 5 second
  • And I am on "/en/search/node"
  • And I wait 5 second
  • When I press the "Advanced search" button
  • Then I should see "Keywords"
  • And I should see "Types"
  • And I should see "Languages"

  • And I check the box "edit-language-es"
  • And I press the "edit-submit--2" button
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I should see "Your search yielded no results."

Scenario: Validate search of a node in different content moderation state
javascript

  • Given I am logged in as a user with the "administrator" role
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I am on "/en/node/add/recipe"
  • Then I should see "Create Recipe" in the "header" region
  • When I fill in "Recipe Name" with "Behat_recipe_search_ContentModeration"
  • And I fill in "Preparation time" with "10"
  • And I fill in "Cooking time" with "60"
  • And I fill in "Number of servings" with "4"
  • And I fill in "edit-field-recipe-category-target-id" with "Main courses"
  • And I fill in "Tags" with "Vegetarian"
  • And I press the "edit-field-media-image-open-button" button
  • And I wait for the AJAX to finish
  • And I should see "Add or select media"
  • And I should see "Deep mediterranean quiche"
  • And I check the box "media_library_select_form[0]"
  • And I click on the element with xpath "//button[text()='Insert selected']"
  • And I wait for the AJAX to finish
  • And I fill in wysiwyg on field "Summary" with "Test Data"
  • And I fill in "Ingredients" with "Cook1"
  • And I fill in wysiwyg on field "Recipe instruction" with "Test Data"
  • And I press the "Save" button
  • And I save the node url

    | http://localhost:8888/en/node/147

  • Then I log out
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • Given I am an anonymous user
  • And I am on "/"
  • Then I should see "Search" in the "preheader" region
  • When I fill in "edit-keys" with "Behat_recipe_search_ContentModeration"
  • And I press the "Search" button
  • And I wait for AJAX to finish
  • Then I should see "Your search yielded no results."
  • Given I am logged in as a user with the "editor" role
  • And I navigate to the node url
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I click "Edit" in the "tabs" region
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I select "Published" from "Change to"
  • And I press the "Save" button
  • And I run cron
  • And the cache has been cleared
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • Then I log out
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • Given I am an anonymous user
  • And I am on "/"
  • When I fill in "edit-keys" with "Behat_recipe_search_ContentModeration"
  • And I press the "Search" button
  • And I wait for AJAX to finish
  • Then I should see "Behat_recipe_search_ContentModeration"
  • And I should see "Behat_recipe_search_ContentModeration" in the "strong" element

Feature: Validate Advance search of a node in different content moderation state

Created node with Drupal API

javascript api
40% Complete (success)
40% Complete (success)
40% Complete (success)

Scenario: 1. Validate admin should not be able to search draft content 2. Admin should be able to search published node
javascript Screenshot

  • Given I am logged in as a user with the "administrator" role
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I am viewing an "article" content:

    | body | Growing anything at home requires taking care of it as you care for your personal belongings. Growing spinach is no different. You dont want to plant the seeds and forget about them. Pay your plants a visit at least once a day. |

    | language | en |

    | tags | Grow your own |

  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I save the node url

    | http://localhost:8888/node/148

  • And I am on "/en/search/node"
  • And I wait 5 second
  • When I press the "Advanced search" button
  • Then I should see "Keywords"
  • And I should see "Types"
  • And I should see "Languages"
  • And I fill in "Containing any of the words" with "spinach"
  • And I fill in "Containing the phrase" with "Growing anything at home requires taking care of it as you care for your personal belongings. Growing spinach is no different. You dont want to plant the seeds and forget about them. Pay your plants a visit at least once a day."
  • And I fill in "Containing none of the words" with "recipe"
  • And I check the box "edit-type-article"
  • And I check the box "edit-language-en"
  • And I press the "edit-submit--2" button
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I scroll ".item-list" into view
  • And I should not see "The guide to grow your own spinach"
  • And I should not see "spinach" in the "strong" element
  • When I navigate to the node url
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I should see "Log message"
  • And I fill in "Log message" with "publish node"
  • And I press the "Apply" button
  • Then I run cron
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I am on "/en/search/node"
  • And I wait 5 second
  • When I press the "Advanced search" button
  • Then I should see "Keywords"
  • And I should see "Types"
  • And I should see "Languages"
  • And I fill in "Containing any of the words" with "spinach"
  • And I fill in "Containing the phrase" with "Growing anything at home requires taking care of it as you care for your personal belongings. Growing spinach is no different. You dont want to plant the seeds and forget about them. Pay your plants a visit at least once a day."
  • And I fill in "Containing none of the words" with "recipe"
  • And I check the box "edit-type-article"
  • And I check the box "edit-language-en"
  • And I press the "edit-submit--2" button
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I scroll ".item-list" into view
  • And I should see "The guide to grow your own spinach"
  • And I should see "spinach" in the "strong" element

Scenario: 1.Create tags and Validate article is not getting created if mandatory fields are marked empty
api content javascript creation en Screenshot

  • Given I am on "/en/user/login"
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • Then I fill in "Username" with "admin"
  • And I fill in "Password" with "admin"
  • And I press "Log in"
  • And I wait 5 second
  • When I am viewing a "tags" term with the name "Knowledge"
  • Then I should see the heading "Knowledge"
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I am on "en/node/add/article"
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I should not see "Access denied"
  • And print current URL

    | http://localhost:8888/en/node/add/article

  • Then I should see "Create Article" in the "header" region
  • When I fill in "Title" with " "
  • And I fill in wysiwyg on field "Body" with "This is the test body"
  • And I fill in "Tags" with "Knowledge"
  • And I press the "Add media" button
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I attach the file "fff.png" to "files[upload]"
  • And I wait 5 second
  • And I fill in "media[0][fields][field_media_image][0][alt]" with "this is alttext"
  • Then I click on the element with xpath "//button[text()='Save']"
  • And I click on the element with xpath "//button[text()='Insert selected']"
  • And I select "Published" from "Save as"
  • Then I press the "Save" button
  • Then I should not see the success message "content has been created."

Scenario: 2.Create tags in spanish and Validate article is not getting created if mandatory fields are marked empty
api content javascript creation es

  • Given I am on "/es/user/login"
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • Then I fill in "Nombre de usuario" with "admin"
  • And I fill in "Contrasea" with "admin"
  • And I press "Iniciar sesin"
  • And I wait 5 second
  • When I am viewing a "tags" term with the name "Conocimiento"
  • Then I should see the heading "Conocimiento"
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I am on "es/node/add/article"
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I should not see "Acceso denegado"
  • And print current URL

    | http://localhost:8888/es/node/add/article

  • Then I should see "Crear Artculo" in the "header" region
  • When I fill in "Ttulo" with " "
  • And I fill in wysiwyg on field "Cuerpo" with "This is the test body"
  • And I fill in "Etiquetas" with "Knowledge"
  • And I press the "Aadir contenido multimedia" button
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I attach the file "fff.png" to "files[upload]"
  • And I wait 5 second
  • And I fill in "Texto alternativo" with "this is alttext"
  • Then I click on the element with xpath "//button[text()='Guardar']"
  • And I click on the element with xpath "//button[text()='Insertar seleccionado']"
  • And I wait 5 second
  • And I select "Publicado" from "Guardar como"
  • And I press the "Guardar" button
  • Then I should not see the success message "se ha creado."

Scenario: Verify English article content is created successfully, updated successfully and Deleted successfully
api content javascript creation en

  • Given I am on "/en/user/login"
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • Then I fill in "Username" with "admin"
  • And I fill in "Password" with "admin"
  • And I press "Log in"
  • And I wait 5 second
  • When I am viewing a "tags" term with the name "Behat"
  • Then I should see the heading "Behat"
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I am on "en/node/add/article"
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I should not see "Access denied"
  • And print current URL

    | http://localhost:8888/en/node/add/article

  • Then I should see "Create Article" in the "header" region
  • When I fill in "Title" with "Behat_article"
  • And I fill in wysiwyg on field "Body" with "This is the test body"
  • And I fill in "Tags" with "Behat"
  • And I press the "Add media" button
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I attach the file "fff.png" to "files[upload]"
  • And I wait 5 second
  • And I fill in "media[0][fields][field_media_image][0][alt]" with "this is alttext"
  • Then I click on the element with xpath "//button[text()='Save']"
  • And I click on the element with xpath "//button[text()='Insert selected']"
  • And I select "Published" from "Save as"
  • Then I press the "Save" button
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I save the node url

    | http://localhost:8888/en/node/149

  • Then I should see "Behat_article has been created."
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I navigate to the node url
  • And I click "Edit" in the "tabs" region
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I fill in wysiwyg on field "Body" with "New test Body"
  • Then I press the "Save" button
  • Then I should see "Behat_article has been updated."
  • And I navigate to the node url
  • And I click "Delete"
  • Then I should see "Are you sure you want to delete the content item Behat_article?"
  • And I press the "Delete" button
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I should see "The Article Behat_article has been deleted."

Scenario: Verify spanish article content is created successfully, updated successfully and Deleted successfully
api content javascript creation es Screenshot

  • Given I am on "/es/user/login"
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • Then I fill in "Nombre de usuario" with "admin"
  • And I fill in "Contrasea" with "admin"
  • And I press "Iniciar sesin"
  • And I wait 5 second

  • Then I should see the heading "Conocimiento"
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I am on "es/node/add/article"
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I should not see "Acceso denegado"
  • And print current URL

    | http://localhost:8888/es/node/add/article

  • Then I should see "Crear Artculo" in the "header" region
  • When I fill in "Ttulo" with "Behat_article"
  • And I fill in wysiwyg on field "Cuerpo" with "Complete el cuerpo con datos ficticios"
  • And I fill in "Etiquetas" with "Knowledge"
  • And I press the "Aadir contenido multimedia" button
  • And I wait for the page to be loaded
  • And I attach the file "fff.png" to "files[upload]"
  • And I wait 5 second
  • And I fill in "Texto alternativo" with "this is alttext"
  • Then I click on the element with xpath "//button[text()='Guardar']"

  • And I save the node url
